name: buttercup
description: :lock: Javascript Password Vault - Multi-Platform Destkop Application

packageJSON.name: buttercup
packageJSON.description: Free and Open Source password vault

scripts.build: npm run build:main && npm run build:renderer
scripts.start-hot: cross-env HOT=1 NODE_ENV=development electron -r babel-register -r babel-polyfill ./src/main/app

linux.synopsis: Free and Open Source password vault

releases.name: v0.9.0 - Empty Trash
releases.body:
This update includes new features and improvements.

### New Features

- Empty Trash Functionality #159

### Improvements

- Change minimum length of generated passwords to 10 chars #155 
- Performance improvements as a result of internals upgrade #156

releases.name: v0.8.1 - Bug Fixes
releases.body:
This release includes several bug fixes and improvements.

### Bug Fixes:
- Fix: Version number color on Linux and Windows #152 
- Fix: Open & Create Archive buttons don't work on intro screen #150

### Improvements:
- Improve: Password-generator text is not selectable #153

releases.name: v0.8.0 - Password Generator
releases.body:
**New:** this version introduces the new _Buttercup Password Generator_ dialog.

![image](https://cloud.githubusercontent.com/assets/768052/21995042/718ddb4e-dc2b-11e6-8fdd-e65f73cf8f4b.png)

### Bug Fixes
- Fix: Unable to select password when shown #146

releases.name: v0.7.1 - Improved Identity & Bug Fixes
releases.body:
This release includes several bug fixes and overall improvements, plus a new shiny logo and set of icons.

### Improved Identity

Thanks to [Arash Asghari](https://twitter.com/_arashasghari) we now have an improved identity. Logos and Icons are improved.

### Minor Changes
- Improved: View password without editing #133 

### Bug Fixes
- Fix: Page titles are visible in windows & ubuntu #137
- Fix: Copy password feature overrides global copy #132
- Fix: Custom property vertical alignment #131 
- Fix: Space-separated meta fields format incorrectly #130

releases.name: v0.7.0 - Import from KeePass
releases.body:
ð  This updates makes it possible to import existing KeePass archive files (`.kdbx` files). It's a first step towards supporting more sources. [Checkout `buttercup-importer` for more info](https://github.com/buttercup-pw/buttercup-importer)

### New Features
- Importing from KeePass functionality: 9ccc1261b6e7da90c7bbd5e7626c50afec0e7966

releases.name: v0.6.1 - Bug fixes, Better window management
releases.body:
Minor bug fixes and patches

### Minor Changes
- Fix(files): better window and archive management: 1a2e9ce8af6fb2f73dc9145e6e1421b6efe35bb4

### Patches
- Fix(groups): sort other groups before trash: e4f6db981019df60ce6630a6f4292a815fbaaf12
- Fix(groups): hide arrow if group has no children: 98749577cf4339cf9d44ed8be22708d96a16e65d
- Fix(entry): prevent submission by pressing enter: 4204df445ecb5aa3327d3f036259eef8591b02b7

releases.name: v0.6.0 - Opening files with Buttercup
releases.body:
ð¥ You can now open `bcup` files with Buttercup directly by double clicking on them.
- New! Opening `.bcup` files with Buttercup is now possible!
- Fixed: Security concern regarding concealed password display length

releases.name: v0.5.0 - Auto Update
releases.body:
- New! Auto updater is here! Buttercup will update itself when a new version is available.
- Some visual changes and eye candy ð­

releases.name: v0.4.1 - Recovery build
releases.body: - Fix: Clicking on dock icon focuses existing window or creates a new one

releases.name: v0.4.0 - macOS UI Vibrancy
releases.body:
- **New:** UI vibrancy effect for macOS
- Upgraded core
- Build process improvements

![](https://dl.dropboxusercontent.com/u/16657557/Works/Buttercup/screen-0.4.0.png)

releases.name: v0.3.0 - Complete Rewrite
releases.body:
ð¥ We have rewritten the application from scratch using latest technologies. Many bugs and issues have been fixed and new features are added.
- Complete rewrite of the application
- Improved performance
- Drag and drop support for groups (nesting, moving, etc)
- Context menu works across the application
- Better fuzzy search
- Better password strength detection
- Moving documents to other groups
- Several bug fixes and improvements
- New builds (rpm, etc)
- Improved development environment
- [More](https://github.com/buttercup-pw/buttercup/pull/92)

releases.name: v0.2.0 - archive defaults
releases.body:
- Added archive defaults and trash functionality.
- Password generator (simple)
- Fixed a few issues.

releases.name: First release - 0.1.0 alpha
releases.body: Our first alpha-release of Buttercup for Mac, Linux and Windows.
